description:
Miranda Lotto is a 25-year-old German woman whose clock caused time to rewind in her town after she unknowingly activated the Innocence inside it.
She often feels inferior and useless and has been fired from over a hundred jobs. This contributes to her chronic depression. With the help of http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen] and http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee], she became determined to become a useful Exorcist one day.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Miranda Lotto
